name: Space Palace
description:
Modifications:

  1. Changed the appearance of the menu
  2. Created three levels, which are interconnected
  3. Added musical accompaniment that changes depending on the location
  4. Added one easter egg (hint: you don't have to go far to find it)
  5. Added decor items and changed the appearance of the final rewards
  6. Added interactive titles
  7. Added humor!

Credits

Malik Valli. April 2021. Course work (MSU, Game Development. Coursera)
